present participle of
require
B1 to need something or make something necessary: Please call this number if you require any further information. Skiing at 80 miles per hour requires total concentration. [ + obj + to infinitive ] Bringing up children often requires you to put their needs first. You are required by law to stop your car after an accident. [ + that ] The rules require that you bring only one guest to the dinner.
